location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledging receipt his letter dated 18 August 1815 and enclosing a statement of outstanding balances at the Bushire Residency, as requested. The statement is included and details debts to the residency from Shaikh Nassar Khan [Shaikh Nasir Khan], Shaikh Abdel Russool [Shaikh ‘Abd al-Rasūl Khān] and Aga Abdel Rahime.
